item.title: Automating development tasks with Kotlin Script
item.description: Kotlin Script is the perfect glue for piecing together a variety of shell commands to automate your development tasks. Syntax we know and love. More intuitive than Bash scripts. Some autocomplete You probably need kscript kscript Dependencies (but these should be minimized) Import support for better script organization & reuse How we used it to automate our regression testing process Display a list of app versions from AppCenter using their CLI, prompt the user to choose one.
